body_html: But the op allows for int64 tensors to be passed in for the shape. I’m not talking about the host memory annotations but rather just the type constraint on the shape. The CPU kernel registrations for RandomUniform allow int64 shapes so why not allow them for the GPU kernels too?
body_text: But the op allows for int64 tensors to be passed in for the shape. I’m not talking about the host memory annotations but rather just the type constraint on the shape. The CPU kernel registrations for RandomUniform allow int64 shapes so why not allow them for the GPU kernels too?
body: But the op allows for int64 tensors to be passed in for the shape. I’m not talking about the host memory annotations but rather just the type constraint on the shape. The CPU kernel registrations for RandomUniform allow int64 shapes so why not allow them for the GPU kernels too?
